entry_hall.name: Entry Hall
entry_hall.description: A grand but dusty hall with faded portraits on the walls.
entry_hall.door_description: The heavy wooden door creaks ominously.

library.name: Library
library.description: Tall shelves filled with decaying books surround you.

kitchen.name: Kitchen
kitchen.description: Rusty utensils and shattered plates litter the counters.

dining_room.name: Dining Room
dining_room.description: A massive table with broken chairs. Candle wax pools on the surface.

basement.name: Basement
basement.description: It's cold and damp. You hear something breathing.
basement.door_description: A locked hatch leads down into darkness.

attic.name: Attic
attic.description: Cobwebs everywhere. A trunk sits in the center.
attic.door_description: A narrow stairway leads up, but the trapdoor is locked.

garden.name: Garden
garden.description: Overgrown hedges and dead flowers. A strange statue stares at you.

secret_room.name: Secret Room
secret_room.description: A hidden chamber filled with ancient relics.
secret_room.door_description: The wall has an unusual outline like a hidden door.

observatory.name: Observatory
observatory.description: A telescope points to the stars through a cracked dome.
